dmca.title: Feckless Demand for Removal [Blogger]
dmca.body:
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE

1. The copyrighted works at issue may be found on the following site:

www.ishotmyself.com

which may be accessed with the following login:

username [Private]
password [Private]

and the individual images are found by entering the name of the folio (that which is the last part of the HTML links below after the final"/" and excluding the ".html" suffix).

2. The copyrighted works at issue are the images which appear on the following links:

http://ishootmyself.blogspot.com/2007/02/alessandra.html

3. Our contact email address is [Private]@ishotmyself.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

6. We additionally request that the user's account be closed as it has been specifically constructed with an address "ishootmyself.com" which is clearly passing itself off as being associated with our site "ishotmyself.com". There is not and never has been any association nor authorisation for this user to use any part of our name, which is currently in the final stages of trade mark registration and therefore there may be a further case for trademark infringement.

Thankyou,

[Private]
Feck Pty. Ltd.
Melbourne, Australia
